## Gene Details:
- **Gene ID:** [AT5G41410](https://www.arabidopsis.org/locus?name=AT5G41410)
- **Gene Symbol:** <u>BEL1</u>
- **Gene Name:** BELL 1
- **Description:**   POX (plant homeobox) family protein;(source:Araport11)
- **TAIR Accession:** 
- **Genome:** [Araport11_genome_release](https://www.arabidopsis.org/download/list?dir=Genes%2FAraport11_genome_release)
